item.title: Nicole add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Nicole add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Nicole add a quote by L.A. Meyer
item.description: "A girl that's born for hangin' ain't likely to be drowned." -- L.A. Meyer

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You donâ€™t forget the face of the person who was your last hope." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Scott Westerfeld
item.description: "What you do, the way you think, makes you beautiful." -- Scott Westerfeld

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Scott Westerfeld
item.description: "Nature didn't need an operation to be beautiful. It just was." -- Scott Westerfeld

item.title: Nicole add a quote by T. A. Barron
item.description: "Stories help me. To live. To work. To find the meaning hidden in every dream, ever leaf, every drop of dew." -- T. A. Barron

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Kristin Cashore
item.description: "I'm not going to wear a red dress," she said. "It would look stunning, My Lady," she called. She spoke to the bubbles gathered on the surface of the water. "If there's anyone I wish to stun at dinner, I'll hit him in the face." -- Kristin Cashore

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Sir Francis Bacon
item.description: "Some books should be tasted, some devoured, but only a few should be chewed and digested thoroughly." -- Sir Francis Bacon

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Cornelia Funke
item.description: "Books have to be heavy because the whole world's inside them." -- Cornelia Funke

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Cornelia Funke
item.description: "So what? All writers are lunatics!" -- Cornelia Funke

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "If I win, I'm a prodigy. If I lose, then I'm crazy. That's the way history is written." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "Who are you?" he asked. I am the future queen of this world, at the very least. You may refer to me as Mistress Koboi for the next five minutes. After that you may refer to me as Aaaaarrrrgh, hold your throat, die screaming, and so on." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Anne McCaffrey
item.description: "Who wills, Can. Who tries, Does. Who loves, Lives." -- Anne McCaffrey

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Anne McCaffrey
item.description: "Make no judgments where you have no compassion." -- Anne McCaffrey

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Anne McCaffrey
item.description: "Necessity breeds solution." -- Anne McCaffrey

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Anne McCaffrey
item.description: "A real scientist solves problems, not wails that they are unsolvable." -- Anne McCaffrey

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Lisa Mantchev
item.description: "She's under duress," Peaseblossom said. "I don't care if she's under duress, over it, or alongside it," Moth said. "Nothing in this world supersedes cake." -- Lisa Mantchev

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Nicole add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen
